ModMetaData.name: Dog's utility equipment
ModMetaData.author: Chunnyluny
ModMetaData.description:
Equipment that will be added by this mod:
Dog bulletproof vest (And variant with Patron's name on it)
IED sniffing Dog equipment
Cute detective suit and matching detective hat for dogs. Have you ever wondered why animals in RimWorld have simple clothes, riding gear and flak armour from the animalgear mod? And you are missing more war armour for your four legged companions. Don't hesitate longer! Get your four pawed fur babies protected of warcrimes. The animalgear mod is required to let this mod work. This mod will add textures for bulletproof dog vest which are cheaper and lighter in weight than animal flak amour. An other option for your dogs to wear are the bomb detecting suits. Get the animalgear https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1541438907 when you have subbed to the framework and this mod, you can need animal equipment https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2568865984.
